body_html: I misread. I don't know anyone working on this; and it sounds like it would need to be implemented at the op level. The interested implementer will need to write a custom kernel (+ GPU support if possible, + sparse update support) in tf.contrib.
body_text: I misread.  I don't know anyone working on this; and it sounds like it would need to be implemented at the op level.  The interested implementer will need to write a custom kernel (+ GPU support if possible, + sparse update support) in tf.contrib.
